name: Ball Farmer
description:
Introduction

Ball farmer is a small game where you have to collect various vegetables and sell them for a profit. 

Some things to be improved:

  • UI
  • Movement
  • Goal/purpose
  • Sound design

Gameplay:

Collect vegetables from the crop plot by touching them with the ball and then go to the big red square at the bottom to sell them.

Things to keep in mind:

  • It has cca. 5 min of gameplay with no real end goal. 
  • It s my first original and finished game, so feedback is welcomed.
How to play?

Controls: 

  • WASD, or arrows -> move
  • Shift ->Sprint

Tips:

  • you have limited storage
  • speed level is OP
  • press shift to move faster
  • eggplants, pumpkins, and cabbages have different storage values and prices, compared to the others (that have only 1)
